mapper.select: select id, parent_id, title, sequence from systemdictionaryitem
select IFNULL(max(sequence),0) from systemdictionaryitem where parent_id = #{id}
select si.id,si.title,si.sequence from systemdictionary sd left join systemdictionaryitem si on sd.id = si.parent_id where sd.sn = #{sn} order by si.sequence
